channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hedges overgrown, 17th June
item.description:
The hedges at the side of 162 castleton road on the council land are very overgrown and in need of trimming, in the past these have damaged the fence panels of 162 castleton road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Castleton Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastic bag of waste, 17th June
item.description:
A plastic bag has been dumped on the street or taken there by foxes.. it’s filled with eggs and shells which have now been strewn across the pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Elder Oak Close, Anerley, London

item.title: Lime bike just dumped on Green Chain Walk, 17th June
item.description:
Lime bike Ref PKL-BXA dumped unceremoniously off Green Chain Walk.Needs speedy removal please otherwise waste of time reporting! Big problems. No worries for Lime?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): King John's Walk, Middle Park, London

item.title: Sluice in roadside pond Priory Gardens needs clearing, 17th June
item.description:
The sluice in the roadside pond is full of debris, stinks and needs clearing. This is a hazard for the waterbirds as it is littered with tin cans, bottles and food packets.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unfiltered fumes, 17th June
item.description:
Persistent lack of the chimney filters. Contant emission of burned wood's smoke makes this area stinking like a charcoal factory, especially during windless weather. Permanent headache.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A constant spot for fly tipping, 17th June
item.description:
This is a fresh pile of garbage from 17/06. This is a constant spot for people dumping their garbage. Council needs to do something. Cameras, control, anything. We’re going to have rats here soon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blithdale Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
